title: Wagamama
typeOfFood: Japanese, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Asian Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International franchise chain inspired by Japanese food. Offers a booklet that assist in making selections from menu based on allergy or diet. Vegetarian items are marked with a V and some can be made vegan, but likely has only 1 fryer for meat & veg.
